gen:link.msg:message: FATAL ERROR: In table [670-75] S0911 should be equal to S0901+S0903+S0905+S0907 with margin of error [1] {{abs([670-75:R9C11|RPC=Year (-1)] ({$a}) - [670-75:R9C1|RPC=Year (-1)] ({$b}) + [670-75:R9C3|RPC=Year (-1)] ({$c}) + [670-75:R9C5|RPC=Year (-1)] ({$d}) + [670-75:R9C7|RPC=Year (-1)] ({$e})) <= 1}}
